title: Pixel 2 stuck on G logo screen loading. Do not want to do hard reset/ data wipe. Please help
content: I have done multiple reboot holding power key and also have done pressing power key and volume key down . Entered recovery mode. tried all methods except data wiping option as i do not want to wipe my data. MY financial and confidential data is there which is not backed up. Need help so that i can restore data at any how as hard disk holds the data and issue is with OS. Google service centre is not operational in INdia and they cannot help .
